alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens and southeastern Wilkinson Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Nicklesville, or 9 miles southeast of Irwinton, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Irwinton, Toomsboro, Chappells Mill and Nicklesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
